name: hotel-chatbot
description: The chatbot who makes you better hotel experience

scripts.load: mongoimport -d hotel-chatbot -c restaurant --type csv --file restaurant.csv --headerline; mongoimport -d hotel-chatbot -c hotel_facility --type csv --file hotel_facility.csv --headerline; mongoimport -d hotel-chatbot -c room_facility --type csv --file room_facility.csv --headerline
